resource.name: Cardiovascular Implantable Electronic Device Monitor Profile
resource.description:
The following data-elements must always be present (Mandatory definition) or must be supported if the data is present in the sending system (Must Support definition). They are presented below in a simple human-readable explanation. Profile specific guidance and examples are provided as well. The Formal Profile Definition below provides the formal summary, definitions, and terminology requirements.

MDC_IDC_DEV contains the following data elements:
MDC_IDC_DEV_TYPE
MDC_IDC_DEV_MODEL
MDC_IDC_DEV_SERIAL
MDC_IDC_DEV_MFG

Open Items:
MDC_IDC_DEV_TYPE - if using type, can include MDC_IDC enums in a valueset. Do we want to also allow SNOMED?

**Each Device must have:**
- a patient
- a manufacturer
- a UDI or device serial number

resource.name: Cardiovascular Implantable Electronic Device Patient Profile
resource.description: An CIED profile of the Patient resource.

resource.name: CIED Connectivity Dates and Timestamps
resource.description: The relevant dates and times related to CIED connectivity, scheduling, and transmission

resource.name: CIED Connectivity Observation Profile
resource.description: Profile of the observation resource to present the most recent connectivity status and associated information for a communicating CIED.

resource.name: CIED Connectivity Status Modifier Value Set
resource.description: Additional modifiers to connectivity status as calculated by the CIED manufacturer

resource.name: CIED Connectivity Status Value Set
resource.description: The overall system connectivity status as calculated by the CIED manufacturer

resource.name: CIED Remote Transmission Encounter Profile
resource.description: An CIED Remote Transmission profile of the Encounter resource.

resource.name: IEEE 11073-10103 Device Type
resource.description: The type of device as defined by IEEE 11073-10103

resource.name: IEEE 11073-10103 Session Type
resource.description: The type of session as defined by IEEE 11073-10103

resource.name: uc1CiedDevice
resource.description: An example CIED device for CIED connectivity example 1.

resource.name: uc1CIEDMonitor
resource.description: An example CIED monitor for CIED connectivity example 1.

resource.name: uc1Patient
resource.description: An example CIED patient for CIED connectivity example 1.
